title: How to Make Bran Water for Cleaning

steps.headline: Boil the bran in the water for 20 minutes.
Strain off the bran.
steps.description: Add cold water if needed to make up more liquid amount.

steps.headline: Use the water to wash the upholstered items by hand; or you could add this to the rinse cycle of a gentle machine wash if the fabric permits machine washing.

text: Boil the bran in the water for 20 minutes.  Strain off the bran. Add cold water if needed to make up more liquid amount. Use the water to wash the upholstered items by hand; or you could add this to the rinse cycle of a gentle machine wash if the fabric permits machine washing.
